website_summaries.verdict: A very practical tool kit with plenty of extras like slip-joint pliers and air compressor, but it trades quality to meet its low price point.
pros: Owners find this kit highly practical, with multiple tools
Users like that the storage bag doubles as a reflector
cons: Tire gauge and ice scraper are flimsy, users report
A few reports of flashlight not working on arrival
Reports of air compressor not working or breaking on first use

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for a New Driver
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit. I bought this for my daughters first car and it has pretty much anything she might need on the side of the road. I added a blanket and she's good to go. Recommended for anyone that does not have these items in their trunk already. The bag itself has compartments to put the smaller items in. Only thing I might change is swapping the manual tire pressure gauge out for a digital one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought 8 of these as Xmas gifts. I also included a first aide kit and some flares to complete the package.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind in a tote bag.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our daughter to keep in her car. I don’t necessarily like the colors haha. But I love that this product came with everything our young driver needs to have on hand in an emergency situation. It gives us worried parents a little piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gifts they liked them got one for my son one for my daughter they both bought their first cars this year
customer_reviews.author: Signe D. MacKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Everything might need in emergency in nice compact case.
customer_reviews.text: Given to grandson for graduation now that he has his own not so new car so he is better prepared for problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift to give to our future son in law. It has everything you could hope to need.
customer_reviews.author: singleton

customer_reviews.title: Much much better in pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Very poor que lift. Flashlight is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hell no
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money do not buy. I was really excited about having this kit until trouble struck and i finally got to test the items. I bought this kit and I am definitely going to return it. The jumper cable is useless it doesnt work when i tried to jumpstart my car this morning, the flashlight is defective and the tire inflator doesn't pump
customer_reviews.author: CocoBarbie

customer_reviews.title: Has what you need
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made tools, but they work great in an emergency. Add in a small first aid kit and you're pretty much set. This kit gives you the pieces you need that you can't pick up at your local pharmacy at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kjm31

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not the one I really wanted, but this will do. Good quality. Will buy more (for my grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: Allen O. Getz

customer_reviews.title: Pray you don't need it.
customer_reviews.text: it is CHEAP! i would not recommend this to anyone. I gave it 2 stars because it is partially my fault, I should have look around and got some reviews. everything in the Chinese bag is junk, I cannot express how cheap it is, words cannot do it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice set for the money. love it. everyone should have one
customer_reviews.author: Traci Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected. I gave this as a gift and my kids fought over it.
customer_reviews.author: Davisgurl

product_meta.title: Performance Tool 60220 Premium Roadside Emergency Kit With Jumper Cables
product_meta.description: Size:Premium Roadside Emergency KitPerformance Tool Premium Roadside Emergency Kit contains essential tools for the occasional automotive emergency. Features 12 volt 250 PSI tire inflator, 8 feet 10GA jumper cables for light autos, free standing warning triangle. Also includes, flashlight, slip joint pliers, bungee cords, screwdriver, gloves, snap blade knife, poncho, tire gauge, electrical tape and cable ties. Comes in convenient carry case.
feature_bullets: Essential tools for the occasional automotive emergency
Features 12 volt 250 PSI tire inflator; 8 foot 10GA jumper cables for light autos; free standing warning triangle
Includes: flashlight; slip joint pliers; bungee cords; screwdriver; gloves; snap blade knife
Includes rain poncho; tire gauge; electrical tape and cable ties
